pattern.name: Sustainability Awareness
pattern.problem: Some stakeholders (here: software users, software developers, product managers, software operators, etc.) do not yet care about sustainability issues. The reasons for this are manifold, e.g. missing sustainability knowledge.
pattern.solution: Sensitize the stakeholders for this topic by raising awareness about software sustainability issues. E.g., this can be done by making relevant software concepts transparent for the general public. Since the interaction between human stakeholders and the software plays an important role, this strategic approach has been registered as pattern candidate here.
pattern.literature: Schmidt, B.; Wytzisk, A. (2019): Nachhaltigkeitsaspekte in der Softwareentwicklung. In: Englert, M.; Ternes, A. (eds.): Nachhaltiges Management. Berlin: Springer, pp. 651-668.
